item.title: Improving Accessibility to Fashion for People Who Are Blind
item.description: Design brief Project overview Type of project: Pre-design This type of project is exploratory and will focus on understanding the needs of your user group to inform the design of a new assistive technology (AT) or application.

item.title: KIO TAPE
item.description: The “Seamless Watch” watch has all the features that users expect in a digital watch, and some unusual features. The watch has the following features:
